name: Grown Ups
description:
Staying in line with our core design principles, 
Gold Plated Dreams 
proudly presents:

the Grown Ups Tee. 

Drawing on our fascination of youthful rebellion, 

+ printed on an all white, 
+ slim cut American Apparel tee 
+ with a more relaxed neck opening 
+ ultra-light 100% Sheer Jersey cotton 
+ for the hot Summer season. 

This shirt represents your aversion to reality and belief that our time is short so we need to LIVE as long as we can.

name: Y&B
description:
Paying Homage to the desert city from which we were born, while still concentrating on the youthful spirit of our ongoing lineup. 
Gold Plated Dreams 
presents: 

the Y&B Tee. 

+ Printed on Palm Springs colored
+ slim cut American Apparel t- shirts 
+ a more relaxed neck opening
+ made from an ultra-light 100% cotton for the scorching Summer heat. 

This shirt was made to represent that we should embrace our years of uncertainty not be embarrassed of them.

name: Summer Skeleton Silk Scarf
description:
Created as a wearable commentary on the human condition, with parts and pieces both tangible and intangible representing ideas and things that make up a person.

Gold Plated Dreams 
presents:

The Summer Skeleton Silk Scarf

+ hand hemmed silk twill
+ 22 inches  x 22 inches 
+ bold colors and shapes to stand out this summer season


Be better than basic. Be BOLD.

name: La Jolla Shores Swim Shorts
description:
Collaborating photography with designer fashion
the La Jolla Shores Swim Shorts
were created as a way to take the core fundamentals of both 
casenkreation® and Gold Plated Dreams
and create something unlike any other
for this summer season only

Thank you
Enjoy Irresponsibly

• Velcro fly with tie waist closure.
• 100% rapid dry polyester
• Approx. 16" outseam
• Front slit pockets; welt pockets
• Photography by Casen Ruiz
